sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="759.333333333333,517.333333333333" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="CSharpCodeActivity_1" SourceCode="string workFlowEndpoint = message.Header.WorkflowEndpointName;
WorkflowEndpointId = String.Empty;
if(!String.IsNullOrEmpty(workFlowEndpoint)) {
	WorkflowEndpointId = configuration.WorkflowHosts[workFlowEndpoint].Id;
}

FilePath = message.GetProperty("FP","FilePath");
OriginalPVIDOC = message.GetProperty("PV", "OriginalMessage");"> <sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <scg:Dictionary x:TypeArguments="x:String, x:Object"> <x:Boolean x:Key="IsExpanded">True</x:Boolean> <x:Boolean x:Key="IsPinned">False</x:Boolean> </scg:Dictionary> </sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> </nea1:CSharpCodeActivity> <Sequence DisplayName="ERPPVAR_Parent" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="759.333333333333,6980.66666666667" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Sequence_5"> <Sequence.Variables> <Variable x:TypeArguments="ne:ESBMessage" Name="CurrentPVARItemMessage" /> <Variable x:TypeArguments="x:Boolean" Name="RetryAfterUserAction" /> <Variable x:TypeArguments="x:String" Name="PlantID" /> <Variable x:TypeArguments="ne:ESBMessage" Name="CurrentMessage" /> <Variable x:TypeArguments="scg:List(ne:ESBMessage)" Name="RetryPVARItems" /> </Sequence.Variables> <sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <scg:Dictionary x:TypeArguments="x:String, x:Object"> <x:Boolean x:Key="IsExpanded">True</x:Boolean> <x:Boolean x:Key="IsPinned">False</x:Boolean> </scg:Dictionary> </sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <nea1:CloneMessage sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="737.333333333333,36" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="CloneMessage_1" Message="[message]" PreserveMessageID="True" Result="[CurrentMessage]"> <sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <scg:Dictionary x:TypeArguments="x:String, x:Object"> <x:Boolean x:Key="IsExpanded">False</x:Boolean> <x:Boolean x:Key="IsPinned">True</x:Boolean> </scg:Dictionary> </sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> </nea1:CloneMessage> <nea1:CSharpCodeActivity ReferencedAssemblies="{x:Array Type=x:String}" DisplayName="Init Transaction" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="737.333333333333,517.333333333333" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="CSharpCodeActivity_2" SourceCode="ProcessTitle = "ERP Production Version Approval Request Enrichment";
LocalServiceURI = String.Empty;
SoapAction = String.Empty;
PlantID = String.Empty;

if(CurrentMessage.Header.Action != null && CurrentMessage.Header.Action.Length > 0) { SoapAction = CurrentMessage.Header.Action; }

//Load the Source System ID and Transaction ID 
SourceSystemID = CurrentMessage.ToXmlDocument().SelectSingleNode("/*[local-name()='NeoPlmProductionVersionApprovalRequest']/*[local-name()='SourceSystemID']").InnerText;
TransactionID = CurrentMessage.ToXmlDocument().SelectSingleNode("/*[local-name()='NeoPlmProductionVersionApprovalRequest']/*[local-name()='TransactionID']").InnerText;
//PlantID = CurrentMessage.ToXmlDocument().SelectSingleNode("/*[local-name()='NeoPlmBillOfMaterial']/*[local-name()='PlantID']").InnerText;
//Set retry item message which need seperate handing.
RetryPVARItems = new List<Neuron.Esb.ESBMessage>();

CurrentMessage.SetProperty("workflow","ProcessTitle",ProcessTitle);"> <sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <scg:Dictionary x:TypeArguments="x:String, x:Object"> <x:Boolean x:Key="IsExpanded">True</x:Boolean> <x:Boolean x:Key="IsPinned">False</x:Boolean> </scg:Dictionary> </sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> </nea1:CSharpCodeActivity> <Sequence DisplayName="PVARItemSequence" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="737.6,1576.8" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Sequence_1"> <sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <scg:Dictionary x:TypeArguments="x:String, x:Object"> <x:Boolean x:Key="IsExpanded">True</x:Boolean> <x:Boolean x:Key="IsPinned">False</x:Boolean> </scg:Dictionary> </sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <nea1:CSharpCodeActivity ReferencedAssemblies="{x:Array Type=x:String}" DisplayName="PVARItemInit" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="614.4,516.8" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="CSharpCodeActivity_3" SourceCode="//Set the inital properties to call appropriate process in retry loop
//PlantID = item.GetProperty(propertyPrefix, "PlantID");
PlantID = CurrentMessage.ToXmlDocument().SelectSingleNode("/*[local-name()='NeoPlmProductionVersionApprovalRequest']/*[local-name()='ProductionVersion']/*[local-name()='PlantID']").InnerText;

List<Neuron.NameValuePair> customProperties = new List<Neuron.NameValuePair>();
customProperties.Add( new Neuron.NameValuePair("LocalServiceURI", LocalServiceURI));
customProperties.Add( new Neuron.NameValuePair("SoapAction", SoapAction));
customProperties.Add( new Neuron.NameValuePair("ProcessTitle", ProcessTitle));
customProperties.Add( new Neuron.NameValuePair("SourceSystemID", SourceSystemID));
customProperties.Add( new Neuron.NameValuePair("TransactionID", TransactionID));
customProperties.Add( new Neuron.NameValuePair("PlantID", PlantID));
customProperties.Add( new Neuron.NameValuePair("WorkflowInstanceId", WorkflowInstanceId.ToString()));
customProperties.Add( new Neuron.NameValuePair("WorkflowEndpointId", WorkflowEndpointId));
customProperties.Add( new Neuron.NameValuePair("ChildWorkflow", "False"));
customProperties.Add( new Neuron.NameValuePair("FilePath", FilePath));
customProperties.Add( new Neuron.NameValuePair("OriginalPVIDOC", OriginalPVIDOC));

CurrentMessage.SetProperties(propertyPrefix, customProperties);"> <sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <scg:Dictionary x:TypeArguments="x:String, x:Object"> <x:Boolean x:Key="IsExpanded">True</x:Boolean> <x:Boolean x:Key="IsPinned">False</x:Boolean> </scg:Dictionary> </sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> </nea1:CSharpCodeActivity> <nea1:PersistAndReload DisplayName="PersistPVARItemMessage" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="614.4,22.4" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="PersistAndReload_1" /> <nea1:CloneMessage sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="614.4,102.4" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="CloneMessage_2" Message="[CurrentMessage]" PreserveMessageID="True" Result="[CurrentPVARItemMessage]"> <sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <scg:Dictionary x:TypeArguments="x:String, x:Object"> <x:Boolean x:Key="IsExpanded">True</x:Boolean> <x:Boolean x:Key="IsPinned">False</x:Boolean> </scg:Dictionary> </sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> </nea1:CloneMessage> <nea1:ExecuteProcess CancelObject="{x:Null}" EnvironmentVariables="[environmentVariables]" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="614.4,133.6" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="ExecuteProcess_1" Message="[CurrentPVARItemMessage]" Process="Process_ERP_PVAR_Enrichment_Item" Result="[result]"> <sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <scg:Dictionary x:TypeArguments="x:String, x:Object"> <x:Boolean x:Key="IsExpanded">True</x:Boolean> <x:Boolean x:Key="IsPinned">False</x:Boolean> </scg:Dictionary> </sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> </nea1:ExecuteProcess> <nea1:CSharpCodeActivity ReferencedAssemblies="{x:Array Type=x:String}" DisplayName="Check_RetryAfterUserAction" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="614.4,516.8" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="CSharpCodeActivity_4" SourceCode="//Read message response back
//var localServiceUrl = result.GetProperty(propertyPrefix, "LocalServiceURI");
//	if(!String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace( localServiceUrl))
//		LocalServiceURI = localServiceUrl.ToString();
	
	RetryAfterUserAction = false;
	bool itemError = false;
	if(bool.TryParse(result.GetProperty(propertyPrefix, "RetryAfterUserAction"), out itemError))
	{
		RetryAfterUserAction = itemError;
		if(RetryAfterUserAction) {
			//Set root level varaible to retry message..
			Neuron.Esb.ESBMessage retryMessage = CurrentMessage.Clone(true);
			List<Neuron.NameValuePair> customProperties = new List<Neuron.NameValuePair>();
			customProperties.Add( new Neuron.NameValuePair("ErrorMessage", result.GetProperty(propertyPrefix, "ErrorMessage")));
			//customProperties.Add( new Neuron.NameValuePair("ErrorMoreInfo", result.GetProperty(propertyPrefix, "ErrorMoreInfo")));
			customProperties.Add( new Neuron.NameValuePair("PlantID", result.GetProperty(propertyPrefix, "PlantID")));
			customProperties.Add( new Neuron.NameValuePair("ErrorTypeID", result.GetProperty(propertyPrefix, "ErrorTypeID")));
			customProperties.Add( new Neuron.NameValuePair("ErrorParameter", result.GetProperty(propertyPrefix, "ErrorParameter")));
			
			
			retryMessage.SetProperties(propertyPrefix, customProperties);
			RetryPVARItems.Add(retryMessage);
		}
	}"> <sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <scg:Dictionary x:TypeArguments="x:String, x:Object"> <x:Boolean x:Key="IsExpanded">True</x:Boolean> <x:Boolean x:Key="IsPinned">False</x:Boolean> </scg:Dictionary> </sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> </nea1:CSharpCodeActivity> </Sequence> <Sequence DisplayName="RetryFailedItemsLogic" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="737.6,4606.4" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Sequence_4"> <Sequence.Variables> <Variable x:TypeArguments="scg:List(ne:ESBMessage)" Name="RetryAgainPVARItems" /> </Sequence.Variables> <sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <scg:Dictionary x:TypeArguments="x:String, x:Object"> <x:Boolean x:Key="IsExpanded">True</x:Boolean> <x:Boolean x:Key="IsPinned">False</x:Boolean> </scg:Dictionary> </sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <nea1:CSharpCodeActivity ReferencedAssemblies="{x:Array Type=x:String}" DisplayName="CheckForError" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="715.2,516.8" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="CSharpCodeActivity_5" SourceCode="if (RetryPVARItems.Count > 0) {
	HasPendingItems = true;
	RetryAfterUserAction = true;
} else {
	HasPendingItems = false;
	RetryAfterUserAction = false;
}
LastErrorCheckTime = DateTime.UtcNow;"> <sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <scg:Dictionary x:TypeArguments="x:String, x:Object"> <x:Boolean x:Key="IsExpanded">True</x:Boolean> <x:Boolean x:Key="IsPinned">False</x:Boolean> </scg:Dictionary> </sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> </nea1:CSharpCodeActivity> <While DisplayName="WhileErrorItems" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="715.2,3924.8" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="While_1" Condition="[HasPendingItems]"> <Sequence DisplayName="RetryErrorItems" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="689.6,3767.2" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Sequence_3"> <sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <scg:Dictionary x:TypeArguments="x:String, x:Object"> <x:Boolean x:Key="IsExpanded">True</x:Boolean> <x:Boolean x:Key="IsPinned">False</x:Boolean> </scg:Dictionary> </sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <nea1:CSharpCodeActivity ReferencedAssemblies="{x:Array Type=x:String}" DisplayName="CreateMessageForEmail" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="667.2,516.8" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="CSharpCodeActivity_6" SourceCode="//Create error message body.
ESBMessage item = null;
XElement rootErrorMessage = new XElement("ErrorItems");

const string errorMessageString = "ErrorMessage";
//const string errorMoreInfoString = "ErrorMoreInfo";
const string plantIDString = "PlantID";
const string errorTypeIDString = "ErrorTypeID";
const string errorItemString = "ErrorItem";
const string errorGroupString = "ErrorGroup";
const string errorParameterString = "ErrorParameter";

XElement errorGroup = null;
XElement errorItemElement = null;
string errorMessage = null;

Dictionary<String, XElement> errorGroupList = new Dictionary<String, XElement>();


if (RetryPVARItems.Count > 0) {
	item = RetryPVARItems[0].Clone(false);
	foreach(var errorItem in RetryPVARItems) {
 errorMessage = errorItem.GetProperty(propertyPrefix, errorMessageString);
 if (errorGroupList.ContainsKey(errorMessage)) {
 errorGroup = errorGroupList[errorMessage];
 } else {
 errorGroup = new XElement(errorGroupString, new XAttribute(errorMessageString, errorMessage),
 //new XAttribute(errorMoreInfoString, errorItem.GetProperty(propertyPrefix, errorMoreInfoString)),
			 new XAttribute(plantIDString, errorItem.GetProperty(propertyPrefix, plantIDString)),
			 new XAttribute(errorTypeIDString, errorItem.GetProperty(propertyPrefix, errorTypeIDString)),
			 new XAttribute(errorParameterString, errorItem.GetProperty(propertyPrefix, errorParameterString))
 );
 rootErrorMessage.Add(errorGroup);
 errorGroupList.Add(errorMessage, errorGroup);
 }
		errorGroup.Add( new XElement(errorItemString, errorItem.ToXml()));
	}
}
item.FromXml(rootErrorMessage.ToString());
PVARItemMessage = item;"> <sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <scg:Dictionary x:TypeArguments="x:String, x:Object"> <x:Boolean x:Key="IsExpanded">True</x:Boolean> <x:Boolean x:Key="IsPinned">False</x:Boolean> </scg:Dictionary> </sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> </nea1:CSharpCodeActivity> <nea1:ExecuteProcess CancelObject="{x:Null}" EnvironmentVariables="[environmentVariables]" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="667.2,133.6" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="ExecuteProcess_2" Message="[PVARItemMessage]" Process="Process_ItemsErrorHanding" Result="[result]"> <sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <scg:Dictionary x:TypeArguments="x:String, x:Object"> <x:Boolean x:Key="IsExpanded">True</x:Boolean> <x:Boolean x:Key="IsPinned">False</x:Boolean> </scg:Dictionary> </sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> </nea1:ExecuteProcess> <nea1:PersistAndReload DisplayName="Persist" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="667.2,22.4" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="PersistAndReload_2" /> <nea1:CSharpCodeActivity ReferencedAssemblies="{x:Array Type=x:String}" DisplayName="Throw error for user action" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="667.2,516.8" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="CSharpCodeActivity_7" SourceCode="//LastErrorCheckTime
//LastErrorCheckTime
var diff = DateTime.UtcNow - LastErrorCheckTime;
if ( diff.TotalSeconds < 60) {
//case where user still need to click the retry for workflow..
	throw new Exception("Aborted workflow for user action!");
}"> <sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <scg:Dictionary x:TypeArguments="x:String, x:Object"> <x:Boolean x:Key="IsExpanded">True</x:Boolean> <x:Boolean x:Key="IsPinned">False</x:Boolean> SourceCode="//Set the inital properties to call appropriate process in retry loop

customProperties.Add( new Neuron.NameValuePair("LocalServiceURI", LocalServiceURI));
customProperties.Add( new Neuron.NameValuePair("SoapAction", SoapAction));

String prefix = propertyPrefix;
bool hasItemError = false;
if(bool.TryParse(result.GetProperty(prefix, "RetryAfterUserAction"), out hasItemError))
{
	List<Neuron.NameValuePair> customProperties = new List<Neuron.NameValuePair>();
	customProperties.Add( new Neuron.NameValuePair("ErrorMessage", result.GetProperty(propertyPrefix, "ErrorMessage")));
	//customProperties.Add( new Neuron.NameValuePair("ErrorMoreInfo", result.GetProperty(propertyPrefix, "ErrorMoreInfo")));
	customProperties.Add( new Neuron.NameValuePair("PlantID", result.GetProperty(propertyPrefix, "PlantID")));
	customProperties.Add( new Neuron.NameValuePair("ErrorTypeID", result.GetProperty(propertyPrefix, "ErrorTypeID")));
	customProperties.Add( new Neuron.NameValuePair("ErrorParameter", result.GetProperty(propertyPrefix, "ErrorParameter")));
	
//		customProperties.Add( new Neuron.NameValuePair("ProcessTitle", ProcessTitle));
//		customProperties.Add( new Neuron.NameValuePair("SourceSystemID", SourceSystemID));
//		customProperties.Add( new Neuron.NameValuePair("TransactionID", TransactionID));
//		customProperties.Add( new Neuron.NameValuePair("RetryAfterUserAction", "True"));
	item.SetProperties(propertyPrefix, customProperties);
	RetryAgainPVARItems.Add(item);
}"> <sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <scg:Dictionary x:TypeArguments="x:String, x:Object"> <x:Boolean x:Key="IsExpanded">True</x:Boolean> <x:Boolean x:Key="IsPinned">False</x:Boolean> </scg:Dictionary> </sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> </nea1:CSharpCodeActivity> </Sequence> </ActivityAction> </ForEach> <nea1:CSharpCodeActivity ReferencedAssemblies="{x:Array Type=x:String}" DisplayName="CheckForErrorAfterRetry" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="667.2,36.8" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="CSharpCodeActivity_11" SourceCode="if (RetryAgainPVARItems.Count > 0) {
	RetryPVARItems = RetryAgainPVARItems;
	HasPendingItems = true;
	RetryAfterUserAction = true;
} else {
	HasPendingItems = false;
	RetryAfterUserAction = false;
}
